ygData.subject: Re: bash at level 8?
ygData.msgSnippet: hi I had a shield on at lvl 7 and went to the trainer and I saw that I could train a pt on bashing so it worked and now I m using bashing. which is good since
ygData.messageBody:
hi
I had a shield on at lvl 7 and went to the trainer and I saw that I could
train a pt on bashing so it worked and now I'm using bashing. which is good
since I only have 1 hand slashing but I know I should have both 1 h and 2h
slashing. Just in case there's a good 2 hander. Someone buy a shield at lvl
6 and equipt it then go to the trainer to see if u can train in bashing.

Elthain of Felwithe
Paladin of Tunare
Mithaniel Marr server

>From: "Brian Williams" <gungho77@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqpaladin] bash at level 8?
>Date: Thu, 6 May 1999 23:57:04 -0400
>
>From: "Brian Williams" <gungho77@...>
>
>Hail fellow paladins. I was lead to believe that we get bash at level 12.
>Well, my half-elf paladin, Abrell, who has felt stuck at level 8 forever
>went to visit his trainer out of curiosity and being bored. He saw that he
>could now train in bash. I spent 1 point in it and went to BB to try it
>out.
>Well, it works. My question is when did they change the level requirements
>for bash?
>
>
>
